Package index

All functions

rf_dispatch_smtp()
Dispatch feedback via SMTP email
rf_do_computations()
Perform computations on data
rf_generate()
Render feedback content for all recipients
rf_get_data()
Load raw data
rf_get_recipients()
Load recipient data
rf_init()
Initialise a recorder feedback project
rf_look_for_computed_objects()
Look in the R Markdown template and identify computed objects required in the code to render the template.
rf_make_meta_table()
Create meta table for feedback batch
rf_render_content()
Render feedback content for all recipients
rf_render_single()
Render feedback for a single recipient
rf_verify_batch()
Verify a render batch
rf_verify_data()
Verify data and recipient files
rf_view_content()
View rendered feedback for a recipient
